weekly picks (Aug 1 week 2022)

Posted on August 1, 2022 in 2022aug 

A WordCloud of 2022 Aug 1st week collection

  1. s41586-022-04940-6 Practical quantum advantage in quantum simulation (quantum simulation, Nature)

  2. s41586-022-04855-2 Magnetic memory and spontaneous vortices in a van der Waals superconductor (TaS2, Nature)

  3. PhysRevApplied.18.014074 Reservoir Computing with Spin Waves in a Skyrmion Crystal (Mochizuki, Physical Review Applied)

  4. 2207.14697 Flipping of antiferromagnetic to superconducting states in pressurized quasi-one-dimensional manganese-based compounds (arXiv)

  5. 2207.14773 Anisotropic magneto-transport properties of the heavy fermion superconductor CeRh$_2$As$_2$ (arXiv)

  6. 2207.14596 Local density of state fluctuations in 2d multifractal superconductor (Disorder, arXiv)

  7. 2207.13725 Ubiquitous Spin Freezing in the Superconducting State of UTe2 (arXiv)

  8. 2207.13889 Identifying $s$-wave pairing symmetry in single-layer FeSe from topologically trivial edge states (arXiv)

  9. 2207.14050 Spin-polarized supercurrent through the van der Waals Kondo lattice ferromagnet Fe$_3$GeTe$_2$ (Kondo-van-der-Waals, arXiv)

  10. 2207.14359 Low-energy plasmon excitations in infinite-layer nickelates (arXiv)

  11. 2207.14412 Antiferromagnetic order in Co-doped Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ probed by resonant magnetic x-ray scattering (arXiv)

  12. 2207.13748 The Kosterlitz-Thouless phase transition: an introduction for the intrepid student (XYmodel, arXiv)

  13. 2207.14129 Magnetic properties of CrSnS3: A new Van der Waals ferromagnet (Cr, arXiv)
